Name: Surya Katakam
Title: So Peaceful area
Review: Chintaman Ganesh temple is also one of the most visited temple in Ujjain District. Self-manifested Lord Ganesh temple dates back to 11th and 12th Century. This temple was built during Paramaras kings and later renovated by Maratha kings. Lord resides here with his consorts Siddhi and Buddhi. This temple was built across river Kshipra on the Fatehabad railway line. Chintaman is ancient Hindu word that means relieving tension. It is believed by the devotees that lord Ganesha here gives complete relief to each and every devotee who visits the deity in times of stress. This is Biggest lord Ganesh temple in Ujjain. This  lord Ganesh is believed as Swayambu and three forms of lord Ganesha are seated together, which are known as Chintaman Ganesha, Ichhamani Ganesha, and Siddivinayak.  Chintaman Ganesh removes worries, Ichhamani Ganesh fulfils desires and Siddivinayak gives Riddhi-Siddhi. For this reason, devotees comes here from far places to get blessings of this God. This is one of the four ancient naturally originated Chintaman Ganesh temple in India.  Temple timings:  Morning 06:00 - 12:00 and Evening 05:00 - 10:00

Name: skdel2016
Title: Good Ganesh Temple
Review: The place is named as  Lord Ganesha will end worries who worship here. Place is famous for Marriage  & Lagna and writing Lagna patri . It is believed that one can marry here 24x7 round the clock. No Muhart for Merage is required here. Well managed temple complex. Should be vested.

Name: Gdj
Title: Chintaman ganesh temple ujjain
Review: Very old and attractive temple of lord ganesha.about 5 km away from mahakaleshwar temple.attracive sindur shrangar of lord ganesha done by temple pujaris.

Name: nugu9956
Title: chintaman ganesh temple
Review: Chintaman Ganesh is the biggest temple of Lord Ganesha in Ujjainchintaman ganesh ke pass hum jo bhi wish mangte hai wo puri karte matlab mai aap koi bhi ek chinta de sakte hai

Name: nilesh_nagar
Title: Ganesh temple awesome
Review: This is must visit temple close to ujjain city. Not far and easily reachable from the city. Famous and divine, sufficient parking area is there and decent place to visit with family and groups. Basically a village area. Can be better if properly maintained by administration.

Name: Gdj
Title: Chintaman ganesh temple ujjain
Review: Most famous temple in ujjain.lord ganesh murti at there. A lot of devotee visit there.all wishe completed there

Name: vinay760
Title: Ujjan Darshan
Review: Very nice and clean temple and has quite open area and visiting on working day help with less crowd.  there are 3 idols and small temple but has historic value and give calm feeling after visit.

Name: Gdj
Title: Chintaman temple ujjain
Review: Lord ganesha temple near to ujjain.every wednesday a lot of people reach to temple. I fill very calm on temple.

Name: Himanshu Bhatt
Title: Divine Destination ( Lord Ganesha )
Review: Its a temple dedicated to lord Ganesha and as per hindu mythology to start any new initiative in life worship of ganesha is must and every ritual starts with Ganesh Pooja. Daily lots of local devotees and tourist from various part of india visited this place to get the blessings from lord ganesha.

Name: trivediar
Title: Divine & Holy Attractive Temple
Review: We were lucky to get darshan of Chintaman Ganesh Ji Temple very nicely and without any rush. It is one of the must visit temples in Ujjain.

Name: Gdj
Title: One of the most religious temple in ujjain
Review: Chintaman ganesh temple in ujjain is most religious temple in ujjain. Most eaceful place. Ujjains one of the famous temple.

Name: CHETANsurat
Title: JAY SHREE GANESH
Review: VERY BEAUTIFUL LOARD SHREE GANESHJI TEMPLE,It is near Ujjan  Shree Mahakal Temple.The temple is dedicated to Lord Ganesha, who is regarded as the Lord of beginnings as per the Hindu beliefs. In the traditional times, the Lord is known as 'Chintaharan', which literally means remover of all worries and tensions. The temple is thronged by crowds of people that come to do away with all their worries at the shrine of the Lord. The term 'Chintamani' is another name used for Lord Vishnu, who is considered as the preserver of the Universe as per Hindu Mythology.

Name: rathod2017
Title: Chintaman Ganesh Temple
Review: Chintaman or Bade Ganeshji Ka Mandir is located close to the tank of the Mahakaleshwar Temple. well maintained and clean place.

Name: Sivakumar V
Title: A Swayambu Ganesh Temple in Ujjain
Review: This 11th Century Ganesh temple at about 6 Km from the town of Ujjain has a beautiful Swayambu Ganesh as the main deity. Ganesh is flanked by His two wives , Riddhi and Siddhi. The temple  has a beautiful structure and fairly well kept. The Vinayaka is said to  clear the worries of the devotees.The ancient temple is one which still exudes the ancientness.

Name: Yogesh L
Title: Must Visit
Review: This is a small temple next to Ram Ghat and is a must visit. Most poojas take place in this temple premises and havan too.

Name: KrA
Title: Swayamabhu Ganesha
Review: Jai Shree Ganesh.Located a little outskirts of Ujjain. Temple is small though campus area is very big.The idol is said to be swayamabhu(self-manifested).Not much crowd. We visited on Wednesday evening. Easy darshan.No specific temple management people.No need of guide or pandit there.

Name: Karpagavalli
Title: Suyambu ganesh
Review: This is believed to be a must visit place and the main deity is lord ganesh who along with shiddhi and buddhi  blesses his devotes. The deity in the sanctum is like a small kundu of some 4 or 5 inches in height and allowed to perform pujai by all devoties. The temples is near the city entrancewhile coming from indore.

Name: Hitesh Rathore
Title: A ganesh temple
Review: another ganesh temple in the city which do not have speciality but just a location which is  little away from the city.

Name: meenakshimuthusamy
Title: Holy Place
Review: The place is holy.It is a holy visit.It is a ganesh temple.The place is very nice and well clean.It is a well known temple in the place.

Name: Namjoshi
Title: Chintaman Ganesh, Ujjain
Review: It is said that Statue of God Ganesha is swayambhu. You can see pillars which were built during 6th century.

Name: Ajay KMehta
Title: Beautiful Form and temple
Review: Great ancient temple where Lord Rama Prayed to shri Ganesh.Very peaceful and quiet and makes you go within.

Name: Payal G
Title: Crowded
Review: This is a very renowned temple in Ujjain near the Kaalbhairav temple. The idol is huge.The temple can get very crowded because of the large number of devotees in the narrow entry to the main chamber (normal for most Indian temples) but the crowd is generally well behaved. Check out people sticking coins on the wall at the entry to the chamber.There are lot of monkeys in the temple but the real nuisance are the kids selling flowers and grass who keep pestering all the visitors. Best to ignore both.

Name: Omkar P
Title: REVIEW OF CHINTAMAN GANESH TEMPLE
Review: This is the temple of Chintaman Ganesh situated on the bank of river shipra and well maintained by temple authority.

Name: arunbvkumar
Title: Leave your  worries
Review: it is a large temple and the self manifested or swyambhu Ganesha Idol is found as if reclining.  Good positive vibrations visiting the temple

Name: The Golden Age f
Title: No worries
Review: It was a very big temple, Lord Ganesha who makes you free from all your worries and fulfill your desires.  Outside the temple small kids sell bunch of grass which is offered to God.  You get lot of positive vibrations inside the temple. If you are in Ujjain don't miss this temple.

Name: piyushkachchhava
Title: temple where your all wishes fulfilled
Review: chintaman temple is a temple of  god ganesha.entrance of temple is  very narrow but despite of that there was a a very long line of people to pray.i loved the place beacuse of that positiveness in environment due to chintaman ganesh temple. a must visit temple in ujjain and to fulfill your wishes.

Name: Prateek K
Title: Lovely place great temple
Review: Lovely dharmik place to visit alone family or friends need to improve management too many beggers harassing tourist.

Name: Footprints727663
Title: Architectural Beauty
Review: I went to Chintaman Ganesh Temple. There is an image of Lord Ganesh, flanked by the idols of his two wives, Ridhi, and Sidhi. The temple is mainly known for its architectural beauty and intricate designing on its walls. It is great place to go.

Name: nilesh_nagar
Title: Famous lord Ganesh temple
Review: The temple situated outskirts of ujjain city is famous for inviting lord Ganesh to marriage. Name itself means the lord Ganesh which lake all ur problems. Good temple worth visiting but unfortunately not very well maintained. Administration need to work on maintaining the temple area. Enough parking area and not far from ujjain.

Name: Himanshi_Saxena
Title: Swayambhu idol of Lord Ganesha
Review: The temple is very old and dates back to 11th century. It is famous, since the idol is believed to be swayambhu (self manifested) and offering prayers in the temple is believed to pacify one's worries.

Name: UmaBG
Title: Very old temple of shri ganesha
Review: Chintaman Ganesh temple is very old ganesha temple believed very blessed place. Local people has many beliefs for this temple.

Name: DreamerDisha
Title: Not a must visit temple
Review: Famous for marriages, getting marriage dates. Saw two marriages happening in the complex. Not a well maintained complex

Name: Vidhi_sharmah
Title: temple dedicated to lord ganesha
Review: lord ganesha the son of lord shiva is worshipped here and it is a very beautiful temple , visited early morning it was not so crowded

Name: nik_0107
Title: Holy templw
Review: Chintaman Ganesh Temple is located outside of the city, though worth a visit. Devoted to lord Ganesh, temple is really good.

Name: Dev-Shiv on a Trip
Title: Ganeshji Temple !!
Review: A well known temple dedicated to Ganesh ji. Huge crowds and a string of shops have mushroomed outside the complex catering to your requirements of Laddoos and other Prasad items. People also make wishes which they want fulfilled and tie a red thread to mark the same and need to comeback and pay homage once it gets fulfilled and untie the thread.

Name: satyaprasad
Title: Visit
Review: Very good place near Mahakaleshwar Temple to visit when you are in Ujjain Spacious Temple but inside sanctum santorium very congested Good place to visit

Name: delhiwalaNewDelhi
Title: A nice Ganesh temple in Ujjain
Review: This temple is just a few kms from the main city of Ujjain. A good parking facility. But lot of flower venders as well as small kids force you to buy flower bunch from them. It is a big temple of Ganesh with a Silver as well as a red stone idol of Ganesh ji.

Name: Kavi P
Title: Very peaceful & holly place
Review: Very peaceful & holly place I like it very much. I went with my friends & the temple is very thoughtful.

Name: Achal
Title: Ganesh Mandir on outskirts
Review: As the name suggest this place is where devotees came in rescue of their problems "चिन्ता" There is rush on Wednesdays and festive time, it's about 8km from main city centre.

Name: Sunil R
Title: Famous but a bit far from the city
Review: Chintaman Ganesh Temple located  about 7 km far south-westerly to the Ujjain. you can go here by your personal vehicle or hire some in  few hundred .

Name: Sumithran
Title: Ganesh temple
Review: This temple dedicated to Ganesha is situated slightly outside the town. A simple and quiet temple renowned to solve the problems of the devotees.

Name: chirag kothari
Title: Lord Ganesh Temple
Review: We hired a tata magic for rs 400 to visit all temple around ujjain. This temple is bit far from city however this temple has lot of importance and one should not miss this temple.

Name: Vijay
Title: START THE DAY WITH CHINTAMAN
Review: Its a popular belief to start the day with the blessings of Chintaman Ganesh Temple. Well maintained must visit temple for great peace of mind

Name: Vipin Arora
Title: Nice temple but not well maintained
Review: It's supposed to be a very blessed place but not properly maintained. Irrespective of that it's a good place to visit . Situated outside the Ujjain city . Local people those who get married visit this temple without fail

Name: Akhil
Title: Jai Ganesh
Review: Another must visit place in Ujjain. The temple with Lord Ganesh us known to take away all your worries and fulfill all your wishes.The temple complex now has a bug dome covering and a lot of surrounding trees have been cleared. Do visit this place and experience bliss!

Name: sovizss
Title: Jai shree Ganesh
Review: Jai shree ganesh"Om gan gan patay namo namah shree siddhivinayak namo namahAasat vinayak namo namahMagal murti morya"Shree ganesh ji we know him by many namesLikeGanesh = gan + ishattgan = bhagwan shiv ke param sevak( kelash parvat par jo bhi bhoot,preat,aur sevak hy vo sab bhagwan shankar k gan (गण) kahlate hy ve bahut powerful hote hy un sabme bhagwan shiv ki shakti hoti hy.And Ishatt = aaradhay ( sab gan jinki bat manege aur bhagwan shiv ki puri sena (fouj) unka kahna manegi aur unko pujegi. 2nd name is shree siddhivinayakSiddhi = shreeGanesh ji ki patni ka name hy devi siddhishree ganesh ji ki 2 patniya hy devi riddhi and devi siddhi.Vinayak = ganesh ji ka name hy jo unki aur hamari ma devi parvatiy ne diya.Devi riddhi aur siddhi sab tarah ke sukh,behav,tarakki aur sabi tarah ki siddhio ko dene ki power hy.Shree Ganesh ji ke 2 bete (son) hyLabh  aur shubh3rd name isChintaman GaneshYani sabhi tarah ki chinta, trouble, problems, ko har ( har= khud le le ne vala)Lete hy. Isliye ganesh ji ko shree chintaman Ganesh bhi kahte hy.Is mandir me 1 kuaa Hy hindu dharam me asa likha hy ki is mandir me bhagwan shree Ram, ma sita aur bhaiya laxman 14 years ka vanvas kat ke jab wapas aa rhe tab is mandir me ruke they aur tab ma sita ko pani ki pyas lagi to kuee me pani nhi tha tab bhaiya laxman ne tir mara kuee me aur usme se pani aa gyaTab se ye kuaa kbhi nhi sukha.Ujjain nagri bahut  hi dharmik nagri hyIs nagri me lakho sadhu,tapasvi, rishi muni aate hy aur tapasya karte hy So jo koi ujjain nagri me jaye vo shree Ganesh ji aur shree mahakal raja aur shree kal beharav baba ke mandir jarur jaye Jai ganesh jai shiv shankarbhagwan shiv shree Ganesh ji se bahut jada payar karte hyDevi ma parvatiy ne bahut years tak shree Ganesh ji kathor tapasiya ki aur Ganesh ji se unka beta ban ne ka vardan maga jab shree Ganesh ji ma parvatiy ki bete bane. Shree Ganesh ji parmatma hyVo keval devta nhi hySab devi devtao me ganesh ji sabse pahle puje jate hy bina Ganesh ki puja kare koi puja safal nhi hoti aur na koi subh kam pura hota aur na mana jataHar puja me shree Ganesh ji ko sabse pahle puja jata hyShree ganeshIs a big and very powerful devta in hindu dharam.Everyone loves him bcz shree ganesh is a very sweet and very helpful devta.He never do any wrong with anyone and he always help everyone in trouble.Jai ganesh jai shiv

Name: AVINASH M
Title: Temple
Review: Ujjain is very historic and spiritual city with all facilities and cleanliness all over. Temples are very ancient and well maintained and peaceful surroundings.

Name: Sunil K
Title: One of the most famous  temple to visit in Ujjain
Review: Here the Chintaman Ganesha temple is situated on the bank of river Shipra . here people thronged in large number to worship god Ganesha.

Name: shivangm871
Title: Another religious place
Review: Ujjain being very old city is a place of many religious sites. This temple is relatively good. Not much visitors turn up and hence good to pay homage to god.

Name: Kawaljeet Singh
Title: one of the main temple in ujjain
Review: located 5 km from ujjain city. mainly Laddu parshad is given in this temple.specially this temple is for removing tenstion.

Name: Masayoshi
Title: Not for me ...
Review: I'm a Japanese living in Delhi.So, I don't think I understand the speciality of this place.It looks some plant harvest is dedicated for the god. Unpleasant part for me was kids come to me to buy that forcibly... annoying.Too remote from the city.Sorry, not my kind.

Name: uday s
Title: A famous temple
Review: Ujjain is a city of temples, this is one of the few temples that is famous in the area and visited regularly by tourists.

Name: blacksteallion
Title: Famout for Local Newly Wed Couples
Review: When we visited this temple, we saw more than 100 newly wed couples with their families standing in line for one glimpse of lord Ganesha. It looked like it is some kind of ritual for locals here.

Name: Satveer S
Title: Must visit place in Ujjain
Review: Ujjain city is famous for large number of biggest and famous temple too and it's a best temple to visit. It's situated at best place in Ujjain have got clean atmosphere too. As there are so many temples in Ujjain and large number of devotees visit there and god bless them. So you must visit at this temple too.

Name: RamGanesan
Title: Ganeshji temple outside Ujjain
Review: Hindu tradition believes that anything that has to start has to be done in an auspicious note.  A visit to the temple before visiting anyother yatra places around Ujjain is ideal.  If that is not possible a visit to Lord Ganesha temple later would suffice but one should not miss out on this temple.  The temple is far away from Ujjain town and hence a lot of tourists do not get here thought it is very famous among the locals.  People visit the temple to place marriage invitations and get Lord Ganesha blessing.  The main sanctum has 5 idols of Lord Ganesh.  One has to hire an auto from Ujjain town to visit this place.  A early morning visit will be very nice as we did.

Name: traveller_prk
Title: A little away from the town
Review: This temple is a little away from the town and also in the other direction of most temples in Ujjain. We had hired an electric auto for our temple tour in Ujjain and realised that it would be way out for us to travel here althogh we had head so much about the temple.

Name: Phb0414
Title: place to start auspicious works
Review: Chintaman ganesh temple is one the oldest temples in city.... ask a ujjaini about importance of this place... temple is away from city life ... early morning visit to temple is more pleasant... place is well connected through public transport

Name: Jitin B
Title: Place to begin your visit with
Review: We started our UJJAIN visit with the same.Highly praised temple as almost everyone who is visiting "Mahakal" visits this place also.We preferred paying over cash offering directly to the "Daan Patra" instead of paying it to the Priest.

Name: 810wanderwoman
Title: Fabulous to see the worshippers, devout and immersed!
Review: Get into the swing of the holy here!  Interesting place!  In dry season, there are weddings all the time and it's fabulous to see the brides and grooms and all the ceremony!

Name: Pritesh D
Title: Lord Ganesha place...
Review: Chintaman mandir is lord ganesha's temple, peoples who believes in lord ganesh must come to this temple. It is said that Ganesha fulfill all the dreams of their peoples who believes on him. On every Tuesdays people use to visit this temple for taking Lord ganesha's blessing. Here you can see monkeys. This is one of the biggest temple in Ujjain and millions of people visit this place in whole year.

Name: ramki09
Title: lovely temple
Review: Chintamani Ganesh temple is abeautiful small temple.Inside the sanctum there are 3 idols of Ganesh.Ichapuri ganesh also one of the idols.

Name: Jagadish S
Title: very famous temple
Review: quite a popular temple. the large stone diety is supposed to have 5 idols of Ganesh in it. out of the city though

Name: tripfreak54
Title: Wish Fulfilling Ganesh Temple!
Review: The Idol of Chintaman Ganesh is Swayambhu with lots of vibration. Ganeshji is regarded as the place where all worries and tension of people are removed. Beware of Monkeys here.All your wishes are fulfilled after your prayer here.

Name: RachanaR18
Title: Beautiful and peaceful Ganeshji temple
Review: It is located close to the Kali temple. We had visited it in the morning hours and it was extremely peaceful and quiet. It is one of the important places to be visited while at Ujjain.

Name: Mekhala J
Title: Pilgrimage trip
Review: Great vibrations. 3 forms of ganesh ji are present here - chintaman siddhi and ichcha ganesh ji. Usually crowded. Fast moving queues.

Name: Santosh Marar
Title: Swayambhu Ganeshji
Review: Was told the idol of Ganeshji is Swayambhu.. hence recommend visiting. You can easily make it during one day trip to Ujjain

Name: Dr_Ankit_Agarwal
Title: Dedicated to Lord Ganesha
Review: Nice Temple. I is easily accessible by auto. there is some extracting of money by priests but if one wants, it can be avoided

Name: priyankprudhvi
Title: Very crowded temple - popular
Review: Chintamani temple was famous and popular, religous piligrimes from all over india are visiting this place

Name: Aditya A
Title: very good  atmosphere
Review: one of the best lord ganesha temple i have ever seen...awesome place to visit...one of the ancient temple in ujjain

Name: VRAMESH
Title: Your Wishes fulfilled here............
Review: Its small temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Temple is located in Ratnakhedi, little far away from Ujjain. (app 7 Km).There is small queue and took 15 mins for Darshan,  The only problem was very pushy children around the temple - they literally push their flowers in our arms pushing you to buy them as a gift for the deity.Temple surroundings could be maintained neatly

Name: Eshwar Makam
Title: Popular Ganesha temple
Review: Popular Ganesha temple in the region... was crowded. Said to be most important temple of the region...

Name: Padmanabhangagan
Title: Chinta - Mukthi  Ganesh( to get peace of Mind )
Review: They have a belief among People who visit this temple, that their worries are eliminated and peace of Mind, people experience all their , Ganesh deity you can pray and have the tilak.

Name: Nirav
Title: Not much to see
Review: Historical temple but not much to see and explore. Not recommended as must see. One can go if time permits.

Name: nilesh_nagar
Title: Lord ganesha temple. Must visit.
Review: Its lord ganesha temple and ancient one.in the outskirts of ujjain. Historic and u will surely get peace of mind. I just loved to b here.

Name: yogindery
Title: Chintaman Ganesh Temple
Review: Chintaman Ganesh Temple is one of them famous temple dedicated to lord ganesha holy cith ujjain is 'temple nagri'.

Name: rameshtiwari03
Title: This is Temple of Bhagwan Ganesh, known as Chintaman Ganesh.
Review: The temple of almighty God Lord Ganesh, people visit their with their specific desire and pray to fulfil it.

Name: Manish B
Title: Swayambhu  Ganesh
Review: The ganesh idol  appeared by its self anf this is the reason the temple is called Swayambhu . Very important religious place to visit and worship lord ganesh.

Name: Sharad0990
Title: POWERFUL PLACE
Review: So much loongoor is there.... snachin spects... so be careful.... very peaceful public in q... a must visit at ujjain.

Name: Sundersham M
Title: CHINTAMAN Ganesha Temple
Review: It is said and belief that your all wishes are fulfilled subsequent to your prayers. For your turn you have to follow q.in summer you have to wear socks as the flore gets heated due to high tempreture.one of the best mandira at Ujjain. To stay at Hotel mahalaxmi had beena good experience. Owner is very friendly and supportive . His contact nonis provided for convenience  of all tourists. 09926632003

Name: Varun H
Title: Idol of Ganesha "Ganapati Bappa Morya”
Review: visited with family, Nice temple, away from ujjain city, lot of langoor's will welcome you, can be visited any time.

Name: Pushpendra M
Title: Just Awesome
Review: Whwn i visit, i feel good energy and forgot all worries. Good view and environment. Must be visit by everyone.

Name: Gaurav C
Title: Beautiful Ganesha temple
Review: Chintaman Ganesh ji is revered by all locals with the belief that he helps people get rid of all worldly pains.It has a meterguage railway station and accessible by road.

Name: DEEPAK_23M
Title: Chintaman Ganesh forget our all chinta here
Review: Chintaman Ganesh ji temple lots of energy and vibration we feel here and also there is a myth that we get mostly what we want from gajanand

Name: abhinav_0211
Title: Just got paid for my earlier ignorance
Review: It is a lovely temple where Ganesh ji is settled with Riddhi and Siddhi. The priest made me think as I was someone important later asked for Rs 250 for his lunch. It was the most crowded being out of city.

Name: BK_TheTraveller
Title: Awesome idol which bring real peace to the mind
Review: Located in the same premises as harsiddhi Mata this temple is a must visit to travellers who search for true bliss. The Ido itself is so peace giving that it truly takes all your tensions away. Very true to its name.

Name: bonen
Title: Did your wish come true after visiting chintamani ganesh?
Review: Guys i want to visit chintaman ganesh but i have a question. Because i have a wish and i really want that wish to be true. So does anybody have the experience that you asked a very difficult wish from chintamani ganesh in ujjain. And you got it? Do anybody has that experience?

Name: Chiragjain17
Title: Jai Ganeshaaa
Review: This place is somewhat 25 km from Ujjain but the route to temple is great when visited in rainy season. Very religious place as various Pooja and yagya are going on nearby. The main garbha graha is small.

Name: Jitesh A
Title: Chintaman Ganesh Temple
Review: A tample of lord ganesh.  5-6 km away from the ujjain city, very calm and spiritual place. A good picnic spot.

Name: Sneha D
Title: Ganpati bappa morya..
Review: Its an ancient temple of lord Ganpati.. its a small temple . Located a little far from city.. its very spiritual place..

Name: Nirantar Singh
Title: Blissful
Review: Chintaman Ganesh is a sacred place ,A must for any devout Hindu . Neat cool and spacious. The evening Aarti is enchanting

Name: Arun L
Title: A popularly visited temple by the locals as well as religious visitors
Review: Though the temple has vast religious following,it has limited historical or architectural beauty,The intricate carving of the usually popular temples is also missing

Name: tikkuJaipur
Title: Ganesha
Review: A good and clean temple of lord Ganesha. It is a short visit from main ujjain town. The statute of lord Ganesh looks very relaxing and divine. If you have any wish you can ask for it and tie a thread in the temple.After your wish is granted you have to come back to the temple and worship the diety.

Name: Rohit
Title: Great place
Review: The temple is mainly meant for people facing obstacle in wedding/marriage and is famous to provide them suitable partners. But others may also visit the same.

Name: Kunal Yadav
Title: Lord Ganesh Temple
Review: This Temple is famous for initiation of anything...1st invitation is given to Lord Ganesha Chintaman.When People buy New vehicle first comes here to take blessing and then only go elsewhere.

Name: Anurag Bansal
Title: Nice serene Temple
Review: A huge campus but not well kept. Took me about 20 minutes to reach there by car from Mahakaleshwar temple in the morning at around 7.30am. 'Swayambhu' idol is a rock formation which is smeared with 'sindoor'. As you enter the small sanctum sanctorum you are engulfed by a tranquility  that is hard to explain. A must visit place in Ujjain with nice surroundings & picnic spots that were under construction in view of coming Singhasth 2016.

Name: Travel_Leisure1
Title: Must visit at Ujjain
Review: It is generally believed in mythology to start any darshan with the name of Lord Ganesha. Must visit temple for believers. If travelling by Bus from Indore, it would cost around 80 Rs in Auto to reach here.

Name: Radha S
Title: Om Ganesha
Review: It is was good experience had nice darshan. It's a very old temple of Lord Ganesh. We found lot ladoo shops.

Name: npn2000
Title: Chintaman Ganesh Temple
Review: Chintaman Ganesh Temple is at outer ujjain , accessible by raod ,good scenic view , This temple is very famous among locals and Wednesday full with worshipers

Name: Arrunadayy
Title: Beautiful Ganesh Temple
Review: What a Murti of Ganesh ji. You will love this place. We sat there and felt the calm and serine atmosphere here.

Name: Satya S
Title: Nice temple
Review: Nice place to visit. Place is good. Plan to visit this as well when you go to ujjain. Had a wonderful time
